title: raajaraajEshvari
sahitya:
rAjarAjEshvari rAja paramEshvari rakSincavE rAghava sOdari



anupallavi



 rAja kanyE phaNirAja maNimaya bhUSaNi rAjashEkhari gajarAja Sanmukha janani



caraNam



 surarAja nipuNi sundarAkAruni dharaNIsha janaka samaguNa shIluni girIsha

 bhaktAgraNi krSNarAjEndruni niratamuga brOvavammA shrI harikEsha bhAmini
